formsPage.pageExitWarningMessage: Do you really want to cancel your job application?

privacyPage.readPrivacyMessage: Before we can get started: During the application process, you need to enter some private information. Because of this, please read the Privacy Policy.
privacyPage.agreePrivacyMessage: I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy.
privacyPage.dummyText: This is the text of the Privacy Policy

applicantsPage.finalizedByHrMessage: {{finalizedCount}} applications has been finalized by HR staff to be sent to HR monitor.
applicantsPage.yetToRateMessage: This list includes all the applications that have been submitted by the applicant but not been rated by HR staff.
applicantsPage.noApplicantsMessage: No application is submitted or finalized

applicantsUploadPage.allApplicantsFailedMessage: Due to some error(s), none of the application(s) were sent. Please try again later
applicantsUploadPage.partialySentAndFailedMessage: {{succeededCount}} application(s) sent successfully and {{failedCount}} application(s) failed.
applicantsUploadPage.allRequestCancelledMessage: None of the application(s) were sent, as it was cancelled.
applicantsUploadPage.nSucceededRestCancelledMessage: {{succeededCount}} application(s) sent successfully. Rest of the application(s) were not sent to the server, as it was cancelled.

ratingPage.applicantRatingDescription: Please provide your insights on the applicant by providing a rating between 1 (not good) and 5 (excellent).
ratingPage.finalizeConfirmationMessage: Do you really want to finalize this form? It won't be possible to edit later.
ratingPage.finalizeApplicantMessage: All changes are saved automatically. So, you can simply leave this form and continue editing it later. If you want to send the data to the server, you have to "finalize" this form. That means that it won't be possible to edit the content anymore.
ratingPage.fillRequiredFieldsToFinalizeMessage: You can finalize this form as soon as you have filled all the required fields. By opening the right menu, you can see where you still need to fill the form.
ratingPage.addImpressionMessage: Please write a few lines about your personal impression on the applicant. Also, if you want to add/mention anything else you can do it here.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.stepDescription: So that we can get to know you better, please provide your first and last name.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.stepDescription: So that we can get in touch with you, please fill out the following contact information fields.

profilePicture.title: Picture
profilePicture.stepDescription: Here you can add a picture of yourself by tapping on the image icon.
profilePicture.deleteTakeAnotherPictureMessage: Good job! If you want to take another picture, just delete the actual picture and take another one.

documentsUpload.title: Documents
documentsUpload.stepDescription: In this step, you can take photos of documents you would like to include in your application. For instance, you can take photos of your CV here. This step is optional: If you don't want to add anyting, you can just skip it.
documentsUpload.deleteConfirmationMessage: Do you really want to delete this image?
documentsUpload.imageDeleteSuccessMessage: The image has been deleted successfully

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.stepDescription: Here, you can add information about your work experience.

educationInfo.title: Education Information
educationInfo.stepDescription: Here, you can add information about your education. So: Which schools/universities have you visited?
educationInfo.subject: Subject

industryAndPositionPreference.title: Industries and Positions
industryAndPositionPreference.stepDescription: So that we can know which industries and positions you are intrested in, please choose from the following.

confirmationPage.stepDescription: The application has been submitted. The following steps need to be performed by the HR staff (either now or later).

submitData.title: Submit
submitData.stepDescription: That's it! You can now submit your application and hand the device back to our team.
submitData.fillMandatoryFieldsToSubmitMessage: You can submit the form as soon as you have filled out all required fields. By opening the right menu, you can see where you still need to enter some data.

keyCompetencies.title: Key Competencies
keyCompetencies.stepDescription: Now, please select and rate your key competencies. We expect you to add at least one entry to "Languages" in order to complete this step.
keyCompetencies.notFoundAddMessage: Not found what you were looking for? You can also add your search term ("{{ searchedTerm }}") to the list.
keyCompetencies.ratingMessage: Please rate your skills from 1 (not good) to 5 (excellent).
keyCompetencies.searchItemErrorMessage: "{{searchedTerm}}" cannot be added because it is already part of the list or it is not a valid name.
keyCompetencies.searchAlertMessage: Do you really want to add "{{searchedTerm}}" to the list?
keyCompetencies.addedToListMessage: "{{searchedTerm}}" has been added to the list.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.stepDescription: Here you can add additional information that you want to include in the application.

sideMenu.description: If you want to go to a previous step, just click on the element in the list!

skipStep.skipMessage: If you skip this page, no information will be transferred. If possible, please provide all information at your hand - uploading a document is one way to do so.

loginPage.title: Login
loginPage.stepDescription: Enter the admin credentials as in HR monitor to authenticate the device.
loginPage.credentialsDoesnotMatch: Username / Password does not match. Please enter a valid credentials.
loginPage.generalErrorMessage: Due to some error, request cannot be processed. Please try again later.
